description:
He is a 32-year-old otaku and video game designer. He always wanted to draw and bring happiness to people, and he joins a video game company with his friend to work as a graphic designer in order to do so. However, for some reason he quits his job, much to his friend`s dislike.
Takehiko is asked to watch a young relative of his named Fumika (a different Fumika from the main characters) for the day, and they get along very well. However, he gives his life to push her out of the way of an oncoming cat, but dies content after seeing the happiness on Fumika`s face while she plays one of the games he helped to create.
name: Hibiya Takehiko
